SEACO Neuropsych SEACO Neuropsych Version %1$s, developed by SSPIT START Records About Welcome to your first task! %1$s %1$s At the end of the games we will show you four coloured shapes and ask you to touch a shape. %1$s However, to test your memory, we want you to actually touch the %2$s instead. FINAL PROSPECTIVE MEMORY TEST 1 OF 4 Remember your first task? Now tap on the shape we asked for. Skip Red Octagon Orange Circle Blue Square Green Triangle Time taken:\u0020 seconds.\u0020 Settings Prospective Memory Test Next DUMMY\nCONTENT Prospective Memory Test Hello world! OK Cancel Please select a shape. Are you sure you want to skip this activity? Skipping this activity. Correct! Incorrect selection, you have reached your maximum of two tries. Now we will proceed to the next stage of the games. At the start of the games we asked you to remember to touch a different shape when this screen appeared. Please try to remember which shape it was and touch it now. Prospective Memory Test Prospective Memory Test - Results Actual Answer:\u0020 Final Answer:\u0020 Correct?:\u0020 Number of trials:\u0020 Game skipped?\u0020 Time elapsed since initial screen:\u0020 Time the final screen was visible:\u0020 prospective_result PAIR MATCHING 2 OF 4 Open the cards and find their matches. Welcome to your second task! \n\nIn this game, you have to match as many cards as possible. pair_level1 pair_level2 fluid_main Begin check In this next test you will have a maximum of two minutes to answer as many questions as possible. Don’t spend too long on any one question and you can skip any question if you wish. Congratulations! You have done a great job! Oh no. But I believe you can do it better next time! I am unable to try this Please try it next time. It is fun to play! Exit FLUID INTELLIGENCE 3 OF 4
You have just completed \nthe first part of the survey. \n\nPlease contact your advisor \nfor further action. Numeric Memory Test Lights Pattern Test Save and End the Survey
>
Add the following numbers together: 1 2 3 4 5 - is the answer?
Which number is the largest?
Bud is to flower as child is to?
11 12 13 14 15 16 17 18\n\nDivide the sixth number to the right of twelve by three. Is the answer?
If Truda\'s mother\'s brother is Tim\'s sister\'s father, what relation is Truda to Tim?
If sixty is more than half of seventy-five, multiply twenty-three by three. If not subtract 15 from eighty-five. Is the answer?
Stop means the same as?
If David is twenty-one and Owen is nineteen and Daniel is nine years younger than David, what is half their combined age?
Age is to years as height is to?
150…137…125…114…104…\n\nWhat comes next?
Relaxed means the opposite of?
100…99…95…86…70…\n\nWhat comes next?
If some flinks are plinks and some plinks are stinks then some flinks are definitely stinks?

REACTION TIME 4 OF 4 In this game, you will be shown patterns. Press match when Remember blablablablabla When you\'re ready, press START GAME button
Do not know Prefer not to answer reaction_main NumericStart In this game, you will be shown a number to remember. \n\nThe number will disappear after 3 seconds, and then you have to enter the number into the number pad on screen. \nThe number will become longer each time you remember correctly.\n\nThe first number will be 2 digits long. \nWhen you\'re ready, press NEXT button. Try to remember the number above. NUMERIC MEMORY Next Skip OK Cancel Are you sure you want to skip this activity? NumericMainActivity %s Round %s NumericMainInput Submit Please enter the number shown just now: Type here… NumericEndReport Last number:\u0020 Rounds answered:\u0020 Number of Digits:\u0020 Correct:\u0020 Wrong:\u0020 Skipped?:\u0020 Total Time Taken:\u0020 seconds EndBranch EndActivity Lights_main In the next section, you will be shown a picture of a small house, like the one below. Some of the lights are switched on. Remember which windows are lit up. Please touch the windows that had the lights on. When you have pressed all the windows that you need to, press "Next".
